import React from 'react' import Events from '../ContentFiles/Events.json' const UpcomingEvents = () => { return (

Upcoming Events

{Events.map((event, index) => (

{event.month}

{event.date}

{event.title}

{event.location}

))}
) } export default UpcomingEvents
